item.description:
HEY THERE . .

THIS PLACE ON RT 1, RIGHT PAST SUCASA IN BRANFORD, HAS A UNIQUE MENU AND IS OFFERING SOME INCREDIBLE SPECIALS TO ATTRACT BUSINESS ( 2 FOR 1 ENTREES, A $12.95 LOBSTER DINNER AND $2 DRAFTS FOR THE BEER CROWD)

IT IS AN INSIDE VENUE AND AT 9PM THEY HAVE LIVE MUSIC ON AS WELL OR WE CAN ALL GO DANCE AT THE CHOWDER POT FURTHER ON DOWN THE STREET AFTER DINNER HERE

LETS GIVE THEM A SHOT . .( i ASKED MANY PEOPLE AND THEY SAID THE FOOD IS GOOD . . .SOOO . .)

group.name: The New Haven Area Dining Out Group

item.name: lets Thai one on together at the LIMELIGHT
